<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Merilo-tloris-načrt</string>
            <string language="en">Ground plan-scale-scheme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">GrundPlan-einstufen-entwurf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan-mesurer-arrangement au sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta-escal-esquema à terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma-regol-schema al suolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίγειο σχέδιο-κλίμακα-σχέδιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan-escalar-esquema de tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Razvijanje prostorskih predstav pri učencih je zahtevna naloga. Proces razvijanja tovrstnih predstav se prične že v začetku drugega triletja in nadaljuje v nadaljnjem izobraževanju. Učenci še nimajo dobrih predstav in si abstraktne stvari težko predstavljajo, zato jim moramo pomagati. Eden od načinov konkretizacije so slike.</string>
            <string language="en">Developing 3D orientation in space - presentation of  different view on 3D object (ground plan, bird\'s-eye view, ...) and using scale to create a scheme.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">merilo</string>
            <string language="en">scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">velikost</string>
            <string language="en">size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">načrt</string>
            <string language="en">scheme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tloris</string>
            <string language="en">ground plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ptičja perspektiva</string>
            <string language="en">bird\'s-eye view</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sich entwickelnde Lagebestimmung 3D im Platz - 
Darstellung der unterschiedlichen Ansicht über Nachricht 3D 
(Bodenplan, Bird\'sauge Ansicht...) und das Verwenden der Skala, einen
Entwurf zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orientation 3D se développante dans l'espace - 
présentation de vue différente sur l'objet 3D (plan de la terre, vue
de bird\'s-oeil...) et employer l'échelle de créer un arrangement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orientação 3D tornando-se no espaço - 
apresentação da vista diferente no objeto 3D (planta da terra, vista
do bird\'s-olho...) e em usar a escala criar um esquema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orientamento di sviluppo 3D nello spazio - 
presentazione della vista differente 3D su oggetto (programma di messa
a terra, vista dell'bird\'s-occhio...) e sul usando scala creare uno 
schema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπτυσσόμενος τον τρισδιάστατο προσανατολισμό στο 
διάστημα - παρουσίαση της διαφορετικής όψης σχετικά με το 
τρισδιάστατο αντικείμενο (κάτοψη θεμεκίων, όψη bird\...) και 
χρησιμοποιώντας την κλίμακα για να δημιουργήσει ένα σχέδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orientación que se convierte 3D en el espacio - 
presentación de diversa opinión sobre el objeto 3D (plan de la 
tierra, opinión del bird\'s-ojo...) y usar la escala de crear un 
esquema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwurf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bird\'sauge Ansicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">échelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">taille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arrangement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan au sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vue de bird\'s-oeil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tamanho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esquema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta à terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vista do bird\'s-olho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma al suolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vista dell'bird\'s-occhio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίμακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέγεθος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάτοψη θεμεκίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όψη bird\</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">escala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">talla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esquema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">opinión del bird\'s-ojo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
